thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Samantha Ireland

author: Samantha Ireland
title: Samantha Ireland
text: Finally! Hose fittings that don't leak! I was convinced I just had to put up with water dripping and spurting from the joins in the hose and was reluctant to spend yet more money on trying another new fitting. Finally I relented and purchased the Hoselink kit... and there's not a single drip to be seen! I need a strong water pressure to clean out my chicken's feed and water bowls but still there's no bursting or leaking. Thank you!
